name: Mortgage interest deduction - top bracket rate cap
description: €100,000 gross with €10,000 mortgage interest. Taxpayer is in the 49.5% top bracket but the mortgage benefit must be capped at 37.56% (2026 second bracket rate). Without the surtax correction the engine would report a €4,950 saving (10000 × 49.5%); with the correction the saving should be ~€3,756 (10000 × 37.56%).

sources.description: 2026 NL mortgage deduction capped at 37.56% (second bracket rate) for top-bracket earners. Benefit = €10,000 × 37.56% = €3,756.
